page.title: 02Cramlington:Introduction
page.content: Cramlington is an area which is changing all the time. There used to be coal mines in many of the places where now there are houses, factories or open spaces. The old spoil heaps have been smoothed out and grassed over. Cramlington is popular because of the facilities available. There is a variety of housing, good transport links, open parkland and shopping and recreation centres. The town has cycle tracks on which people can travel from one estate to another in safety. The town is surrounded by some beautiful countryside including Plessey Woods, which is a Country Park.
